channel.title: Changing client backround
channel.description: ok...i cant figure out how to change the backround picture, i searched my sprites for the pictures that match the backround and there where none. What do i do?

item.title: Changing client backround
item.dc:creator: @Helixian Helixian
item.description:
@Helixian wrote:

im sure you just put the pic you want on there, then open class30.sub_2.sub_1.sub_1 (or something like that, does have 2 1 1 in that order), and search the name of the file the pic used to be before you added your pic. then fill in the space by typing the name of your pic

Read full topic

item.title: Changing client backround
item.dc:creator: @xxlukexx xxlukexx
item.description:
@xxlukexx wrote:

if u open up ur client there should be a picture with all ur files just change the picture.

sometimes its somewhere else (forgot sorry) but iv forgot where.
